text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them are the Gardens of Pleasure.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan amal-amal saleh, bagi mereka surga-surga yang penuh kenikmatan,
